      • namePattern

        public java.util.ArrayList<MyFile> namePattern(java.util.ArrayList<MyFile> inputArr,
                                      java.lang.String startPattern,
                                      java.lang.String endPattern)
        Identify files that start/end with a particular pattern. e.g 01-Let it be.mp3, 02-Help!.mp3 etc. So pick files that start/end with a particular pattern defined by a character sequence or regex.
        Parameters:
        inputArr - - array of files to look into
        startPattern - - Pattern we're looking for in the beginning of the file name
        endPattern - - Pattern we're looking for at the end of the file name
        Returns:
        fileList - List of files with similar name patterns
